about_the_game:
With new rifts opening, updated mechanics taking effect for the Osamodas class, and a new "Cosmetics Inventory" interface being added, your online shop is also pulling out all the stops and preparing to make a real gentleman or lady out of you.



The Nostalgic Pack awaits you in the shop, from now until the next update. It contains:

A 30-day God Booster
Nostalgic Drheller Skin (linked to the account)
Nostalgic Dragoone Skin (linked to the account)
Nostalgic Costume
detailed_description:
With new rifts opening, updated mechanics taking effect for the Osamodas class, and a new "Cosmetics Inventory" interface being added, your online shop is also pulling out all the stops and preparing to make a real gentleman or lady out of you.



The Nostalgic Pack awaits you in the shop, from now until the next update. It contains:

A 30-day God Booster
Nostalgic Drheller Skin (linked to the account)
Nostalgic Dragoone Skin (linked to the account)
Nostalgic Costume

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Pentium IV 2.8 GHz or equivalent
  • Graphics: GeForce 4Ti or equivalent
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Graphics: GeForce 6 series or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 10.13
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 ou supérieur
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

name: WAKFU - Pack Nostalgique

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • OS *: Windows XP SP3 or higher
  • Processor: Pentium IV 2.8 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 1.3

pegi.descriptors:
Non realistic looking violence towards human characters.

This game allows the player to interact with other players ONLINE.

short_description: With new rifts opening, updated mechanics taking effect for the Osamodas class, and a new "Cosmetics Inventory" interface being added, your online shop is also pulling out all the stops and preparing to make a real gentleman or lady out of you.
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, German
